alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 26 at 10:25PM CDT until April 27 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL GILLESPIE COUNTY... At 1025 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cherry Spring, or 17 miles northwest of Fredericksburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cherry Spring, Crabapple and Enchanted Rock State Natural Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
